# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. Embassy has received today, November 20, a circular note from Bolivian MFA dated November 17, 1979, expressing GOB's "desire to continue the cordial relations existing between the two countries", Spanish text as follows:

> El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Culto, saluda muy atentamente a las Honorables Misiones Diplomaticas acreditadas ante el Gobierno de Bolivia y tiene a honra poner en su conocimiento que, al restablecerse el orden democratico iniciado en agosto ultimo, como es del dominio publico, el Honorable Congreso Nacional ha designado a la Excelentisima Senora Dona Lidia Gueiler Tejada como Presidente Constitucional Interino de la Republica.
>
> En consecuencia, el Supremo Gobierno de Bolivia, expresa el deseo de continuar las cordiales relaciones existentes entre los dos paises.
>
> El Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Culto hace propicia la oportunidad para reiterar a las Honorables Misiones Diplomaticas acreditadas ante el Gobierno de Bolivia, las seguridades de su mas alta y distinguida consideracion.

2. We recommend that Department authorize the Embassy ASAP to reply as follows:

The Embassy of the United States of America presents its compliments to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Worship of the Republic of Bolivia and has the honor to acknowledge receipt of the Ministry's note of November 17, 1979 expressing the Government of Bolivia's desire to continue cordial relations between the Republic of Bolivia and the United States of America, and informing us of the reestablishment of democratic processes in Bolivia and of the election of Mrs. Lidia Gueiler Tejada as Interim Constitutional President of the Republic.

Our government welcomes Bolivia's return to democratic processes and through this Embassy has the honor to inform the Ministry that the Government of the United States fully reciprocates the desire expressed in the Ministry's note to continue the cordial relations between our two governments.

The Embassy avails itself of this opportunity to renew to the Ministry the assurances of its highest consideration.
